decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Subject to the requirements of condition 6, the temporary use of the site as hereby permitted is restricted to a total of 30 annual days (to include preview showings) in the months of January and February, between the years of 2017 and 2021 (inclusive). The site shall be closed to members of the public between the hours of 22:30 and 07:00 during this period.

Condition : 2 - The operation of any music, public address system or other sound amplification equipment in association with the development hereby permitted shall not take place outside of the hours of 08:00 and 22:00.

Condition : 3 - Any music, public address system or other sound amplification equipment noise levels in association with the development hereby permitted, when measured or predicted at 1m from the fa?ade of noise sensitive premises, shall not exceed 65dB(a) over a 15 minute period.
Condition : 4 - The measures in the Travel Plan received 10th January 2017 shall at all times be implemented as approved throughout the 2017 event.
Condition : 5 - The event website shall provide a link to Transport for London's 'Plan a journey' webpage.
Condition : 7 - Each daily session shall have a maximum capacity of 7,000 visitors.
Condition : 8 - This approval does not permit the use of floodlighting in association with the temporary use of the site without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 9 - Subject to the requirements of condition 6, the proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawings: D105961/SK/016 (Location Plan) received 10th November 2016; Marquee Plan (unnumbered) & Layout Plan (unnumbered) received 7th December 2016; China Lantern Festival 2017 (Display layout) received 1st November 2017; Design & Access Statement dated September 2016, Event Management Plan (version 4) & Magic Lantern Festival Illustrative Images 2017, all received 1st November 2016; Event Travel Plan received 10th January 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Temporary use of land for The Magical Lantern Festival to include installation of marquee and stalls.
